description: Aqueduct Floods is an online platform that measures riverine and coastal flood risks under both current baseline conditions and future projections in 2030, 2050, an 2080.
title: Aqueduct Flood Hazard
citation: Hofste, R., S. Kuzma, S. Walker, E.H. Sutanudjaja, et. al. 2019. “Aqueduct 3.0: Updated Decision Relevant Global Water Risk Indicators.” Technical Note. Washington, DC: World Resources InstituteHofste, R., S. Kuzma, S. Walker, E.H. Sutanudjaja, et. al. 2019. “Aqueduct 3.0: Updated Decision Relevant Global Water Risk Indicators.” Technical Note. Washington, DC: World Resources Institute
